mapper.select: SELECT mlevel FROM member WHERE uid = #{uid} AND passwd = #{passwd} AND mlevel IN ('A','B','C')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(uid, passwd, uname, tel, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2, birth, mdate) VALUES(#{uid}, #{passwd}, #{uname}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{birth}, NOW())
